title: Start the REMIND Integrated Assessment Model

what: Start REMIND from the command line
title: Start the REMIND Integrated Assessment Model
text: working directory remind directory: working directory remind directory, specify path remind argument:
code: # Default cfg Rscript -e "remindStart::start()"   # Pass a scenario config file Rscript -e "remindStart::start()" --args path/to/config_file.csv Rscript -e "remindStart::start(configFile = 'path/to/config_file.csv')"  # Restart Rscript -e "remindStart::start()" --args restart Rscript -e "remindStart::start(restart = TRUE)"  # Test one region Rscript -e "remindStart::start()" --args testOneRegi Rscript -e "remindStart::start(testOneRegi = TRUE)" Rscript -e "remindStart::start(remind = 'path/to/remind')"

title: start — start
text: Start REMIND model.

title: start — start
code: start(   remind = ".",   configFile = NULL,   restart = FALSE,   testOneRegi = FALSE,   mock = FALSE )

title: start — start
text: remind character vector path remind main-folder. default, assumed working directory remind main-folder. configFile NULL character vector path scenario config csv file. restart TRUE FALSE testOneRegi TRUE FALSE mock TRUE FALSE. Used testing. Set TRUE test start procedure.

title: start_bundle_coupled — start_bundle_coupled
text: Start coupled runs

title: start_bundle_coupled — start_bundle_coupled
code: start_bundle_coupled(   path_remind,   path_magpie,   path_settings_coupled,   path_settings_remind,   prefix_runname = "C_",   path_remind_oldruns = paste0(path_remind, "output"),   path_magpie_oldruns = paste0(path_magpie, "output"),   prefix_oldruns = "C_",   max_iterations = 5,   n600_iterations = 0,   test = FALSE )

title: start_bundle_coupled — start_bundle_coupled
text: path_remind Path remind model path_magpie Path mapie model path_settings_coupled path_settings_coupled defines runs started, coupling infos, optimal gdx report information overrides path_settings_remind path_settings_remind path_settings_remind contains detailed configuration REMIND scenarios prefix_runname "C_" path_remind_oldruns existing runs like take gdxes (REMIND) reportings (REMIND MAgPIE) , provide path name prefix . Note: scenario names old runs identical runs started. differ please provide names old scenarios file specified path_settings_coupled (scenario_config_coupled_xxx.csv). path_magpie_oldruns existing runs like take gdxes (REMIND) reportings (REMIND MAgPIE) , provide path name prefix . Note: scenario names old runs identical runs started. differ please provide names old scenarios file specified path_settings_coupled (scenario_config_coupled_xxx.csv). prefix_oldruns want script find gdxs reports older runs starting point new runs please provide prefix old run names script can find . max_iterations Integer n600_iterations Number coupling iterations (final iteration) MAgPIE uses higher n600 resolution. "max_iteration - n600_iterations" iteration MAgPIE runs n200 resolution. Afterwards REMIND runs "n600_iterations" iterations results higher resolution. test Logical. Set TRUE test function.
